sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { Navbar, Nav, Container,NavDropdown } from 'react-bootstrap' import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' import {useSelector, useDispatch} from 'react-redux' import { logoutUser } from '../actions/userAction' const NavBar = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const cartState = useSelector((state)=>state.cartReducer) const {currentUser} = useSelector((state)=>state.loginReducer) return ( <>
{currentUser? ( My Orders {dispatch(logoutUser())}}>Log Out ) : (<> Login Register ) } Cart {cartState.cartItems.length}
) } export default NavBar
